mapper.sql: RECORD_ID, PLAN_ID, IDENTITY_NO, NAME, MOBILE_PHONE_NUM, VISIT_ID, VISIT_TYPE, VISIT_START_DATE_TIME, VISIT_ORG_CODE, VISIT_ORG_NAME, HIS_DEPT_CODE, HIS_DEPT_NAME, DOCTOR_NAME, SMS_SEND_CONTENT, SEND_DATE_TIME, IS_REPLY, SMS_REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE_TIME, REFLACT_CONTENT, IS_SMS_REPLY_CONTENT_VALID, MANUAL_PROCESSED, PROCESS_ORG_CODE, PROCESS_ORG_NAME, PROCESS_PERSON_ID, PROCESS_PERSON_NAME, PROCESS_DATE_TIME, IS_SATISFACTION, CSR_RESULT_CODE, CSR_RESULT_NAME, THE_BEST_DOCTOR, THE_WORST_DOCTOR, DOCTOR_CODE
mapper.select: select count(RECORD_ID) from csr_record where MANUAL_PROCESSED = '0'

select
from csr_record order by REPLY_DATE_TIME desc limit #{0},#{1}
mapper.insert: insert into csr_record (RECORD_ID, PLAN_ID, IDENTITY_NO, NAME, MOBILE_PHONE_NUM, VISIT_ID, VISIT_TYPE, VISIT_START_DATE_TIME, VISIT_ORG_CODE, VISIT_ORG_NAME, HIS_DEPT_CODE, HIS_DEPT_NAME, DOCTOR_NAME, SMS_SEND_CONTENT, SEND_DATE_TIME, IS_REPLY, SMS_REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE_TIME, REFLACT_CONTENT, IS_SMS_REPLY_CONTENT_VALID, MANUAL_PROCESSED, PROCESS_ORG_CODE, PROCESS_ORG_NAME, PROCESS_PERSON_ID, PROCESS_PERSON_NAME, PROCESS_DATE_TIME, IS_SATISFACTION, CSR_RESULT_CODE, CSR_RESULT_NAME, THE_BEST_DOCTOR, THE_WORST_DOCTOR, DOCTOR_CODE ) values (#{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{identityNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitStartDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{visitOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hisDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hisDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsSendContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isReply,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{smsReplyContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reflactContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSmsReplyContentValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{manualProcessed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isSatisfaction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{csrResultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csrResultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theBestDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theWorstDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update csr_record
PLAN_ID = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IDENTITY_NO = #{identityNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE_PHONE_NUM = #{mobilePhoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VISIT_ID = #{visitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VISIT_TYPE = #{visitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VISIT_START_DATE_TIME = #{visitStartDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VISIT_ORG_CODE = #{visitOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VISIT_ORG_NAME = #{visitOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIS_DEPT_CODE = #{hisDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIS_DEPT_NAME = #{hisDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCTOR_NAME = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMS_SEND_CONTENT = #{smsSendContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_DATE_TIME = #{sendDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_REPLY = #{isReply,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SMS_REPLY_CONTENT = #{smsReplyContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPLY_DATE_TIME = #{replyDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REFLACT_CONTENT = #{reflactContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_SMS_REPLY_CONTENT_VALID = #{isSmsReplyContentValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MANUAL_PROCESSED = #{manualProcessed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROCESS_ORG_CODE = #{processOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_ORG_NAME = #{processOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_PERSON_ID = #{processPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_PERSON_NAME = #{processPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_DATE_TIME = #{processDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_SATISFACTION = #{isSatisfaction,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CSR_RESULT_CODE = #{csrResultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSR_RESULT_NAME = #{csrResultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THE_BEST_DOCTOR = #{theBestDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THE_WORST_DOCTOR = #{theWorstDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCTOR_CODE = #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RECORD_ID = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update csr_record set PLAN_ID = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IDENTITY_NO = #{identityNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE_NUM = #{mobilePhoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_ID = #{visitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_TYPE = #{visitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_START_DATE_TIME = #{visitStartDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VISIT_ORG_CODE = #{visitOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_ORG_NAME = #{visitOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIS_DEPT_CODE = #{hisDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIS_DEPT_NAME = #{hisDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCTOR_NAME = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMS_SEND_CONTENT = #{smsSendContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_DATE_TIME = #{sendDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_REPLY = #{isReply,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SMS_REPLY_CONTENT = #{smsReplyContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPLY_DATE_TIME = #{replyDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REFLACT_CONTENT = #{reflactContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SMS_REPLY_CONTENT_VALID = #{isSmsReplyContentValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MANUAL_PROCESSED = #{manualProcessed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROCESS_ORG_CODE = #{processOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_ORG_NAME = #{processOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_PERSON_ID = #{processPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_PERSON_NAME = #{processPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_DATE_TIME = #{processDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_SATISFACTION = #{isSatisfaction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CSR_RESULT_CODE = #{csrResultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSR_RESULT_NAME = #{csrResultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THE_BEST_DOCTOR = #{theBestDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THE_WORST_DOCTOR = #{theWorstDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCTOR_CODE = #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RECORD_ID = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
